text: Aur agar Allah logon per jaldi say nuksan waaqay ker diya kerta jiss tarah woh faeeday kay liye jaldi machatay hain to unn ka wada kabhi ka poora ho chuka hota. So hum unn logon ko jin ko humaray pass aaney ka yaqeen nahi hai unn kay haal per chor rakhtay hain kay apni sirkashi mein bhataktay rahen
